channel.title: A Small Question
channel.description:
I have a standard Localhost client on my computer, but it doesn't connect to my server in the correct way it's suppose to do. I don't have Internet on the computer it's on, and the Client is the only one I got. I don't know how to fix this error, but yet I can't go on the Internet to download a new client, or to get help. My Client backup copy doesn't work either. The client doesn't connect to my server while i'm left board. What am I suppose to do, because it's getting really annoying constintly trying to fix this.
Thanks.

item.title: A Small Question
item.dc:creator: @Mr_ServerSoft Mr. ServerSoft
item.description:
@Mr_ServerSoft wrote:
